sentences: Rado is a native of Westlake Village, California, where he formed Foxygen with his classmate Sam France in 2005.
In 2018, Billboard called Rado "one of indie rock's most in-demand producers".
He also appeared in a 2008 episode of the television series Weeds and a 2009 episode of the sitcom Community.
He studied screenwriting at the School of Visual Arts in New York.
